summary: This function creates an iterable whose iterator can iterate over the keys in a map.
returns: Return an unmodifiable view of the input.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val capitals = new TreeMap();%0A%0A    capitals.put(%22UK%22,     %22London%22);%0A    capitals.put(%22USA%22,    %22Washington%22);%0A    capitals.put(%22Russia%22, %22Moscow%22);%0A%0A    val result = F::iter(capitals);%0A%0A    foreach (key : String in result)%0A    {%0A        val value = capitals.get(key);%0A%0A        F::println(%22Key: %22 .. key);%0A        F::println(%22Value: %22 .. value);%0A        F::println();%0A    }%0A}
Key: Russia%0AValue: Moscow%0A%0AKey: UK%0AValue: London%0A%0AKey: USA%0AValue: Washington
